key.name: merge-with-settings
key.summary: Merge both Settings and Tweaks into a single button.
key.description: When enabled, both Settings and Tweaks share a single button: the Settings button is visible when the system menu opens, and Tweaks can be shown by pressing the "Alt" key or by long clicking on the button. When disabled, Tweaks uses its own, different button.

key.name: position
key.description: If set to -1, the button position is automatic: the merged button replaces the Settings button, and if the buttons are not merged, Tweaks will show up to the right of the Settings button. If set to zero or more, the actual button position on the system menu.
